title: StarCraft 2: EPIC MATCH - ByuN vs Rogue!
excerpt: Epic game of professional StarCraft 2 between ByuN (Terran) and Rogue (Zerg). This game starts off with a Ravager rush but quickly transforms into a great macro game.
